channel.title: FreePromptHub - Money & Finance Prompts

item.title: Cut Grocery Bills in Half - Money | FreePromptHub

item.description: AI prompt to turn household clutter into $1000+ cash. Get specific strategies for selling items you already own for maximum profit online and locally.

item.description: AI prompt to make an extra $500 this month with realistic side income ideas. No MLM schemes or get-rich-quick nonsense - just proven strategies that work.

item.title: Lower Your Monthly Bills - Money | FreePromptHub
item.description: AI prompt to lower your monthly bills without switching services. Get negotiation scripts that actually work to reduce cable, phone, insurance, and more.

item.title: AI Budget Optimizer Prompt - Money | FreePromptHub
